name: Purno Agitok Sangma
governor1: Bhishma Narain Singh, Hari Dev Joshi, Abubakar Abdul Rahim
party: Indian National Congress  (Before 1999) , Nationalist Congress Party  (1999–2004; 2005–2012) , All India Trinamool Congress  (2004–2005) , Independent  (2012–2013) , National People's Party  (2013–present)
otherparty: United Front  (1996–2004) , United Progressive Alliance  (2004–2012) , National Democratic Alliance  (2012–present)
alma_mater: St. Anthony's College, Shillong, Dibrugarh University
